issue.title: [R] [CI] Alternative BLAS/LAPACK implementations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14535](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14535). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CRAN runs tests against a number of alternative linear algebra implementations: https://www.stats.ox.ac.uk/pub/bdr/Rblas/README.txt

We probably don't actually need to run these since we aren't interacting with operations in R that would use them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14535?focusedCommentId=17624736) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
We don't use BLAS or LAPACK and this has never failed for us on CRAN, so we can skip this
